properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:41PM CST until January 18 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Carroll and Leflore Counties
Big Sunflower River Near Anguilla affecting Sharkey County
Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Yalobusha At Whaley
* until Saturday afternoon.
* At  8:00 PM Tuesday the stage was 22.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 23.0 feet
tomorrow morning.
* Impact...At 23.0 feet...Minor flooding of lowland and agricultural
land is occurring.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected between 8 and 10 AM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Saturday afternoon
